pages.terms-conditions: FloorFlex Terms of Use - Website Usage Guidelines floorflex@gmail.com Hours: Mon-Fri: 8am – 7pm FloorFlex Home Why are we Services Space Advantages Start work +91-758-3022397 Terms of Use Termination of Use FloorFlex reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to terminate your access to all or part of this website, with or without notice, for any reason, including but not limited to, breach of these Terms of Use. In the event of termination, you are no longer authorized to access the website, and the restrictions imposed on you with respect to the materials and content downloaded from the website, as well as the disclaimers and limitations of liabilities set forth in these Terms of Use, shall survive. Severability If any provision of these Terms of Use is found to be invalid or unenforceable, that provision shall be enforced to the maximum extent possible, and the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect. No Waiver The failure of FloorFlex to enforce any right or provision of these Terms of Use will not be deemed a waiver of such right or provision. Links to Third-Party Websites The FloorFlex website may contain links to third-party websites that are not owned or controlled by FloorFlex. We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites. By using this website, you expressly relieve FloorFlex from any and all liability arising from your use of any third-party website. Product Availability and Pricing FloorFlex strives to provide accurate and up-to-date information regarding product availability and pricing on our website. However, we cannot guarantee that all products listed on the website will be available at the time of purchase or that the prices listed are accurate. In the event of a discrepancy between the price listed on the website and the actual price of a product, FloorFlex reserves the right to charge the correct price or cancel the order. Shipping and Delivery FloorFlex ships products to most locations within the India. Shipping rates and delivery times vary based on the destination and the selected shipping method. Please note that we are not responsible for any delays caused by the shipping carrier or any other factors beyond our control. Testimonials and Reviews FloorFlex may post testimonials and reviews from customers on our website. By submitting a testimonial or review, you grant FloorFlex the right to use your name, likeness, and the content of your testimonial or review for marketing and promotional purposes without compensation. Entire Agreement These Terms of Use constitute the entire agreement between you and FloorFlex regarding the use of this website, superseding any prior agreements or understandings between you and FloorFlex. Modification of Services FloorFlex reserves the right to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, the website (or any part thereof) with or without notice. You agree that FloorFlex will not be liable to you or to any third party for any modification, suspension, or discontinuance of the website. Promotions and Discounts FloorFlex may occasionally offer promotions or discounts on products available on our website. These offers are subject to change without notice and may be limited to specific products or customers. FloorFlex reserves the right to cancel or modify any promotion or discount at any time without prior notice. Force Majeure FloorFlex shall not be liable for any failure or delay in performance under these Terms of Use due to causes beyond its reasonable control, including but not limited to acts of God, war, terrorism, natural disasters, labor disputes, or governmental actions. Assignment You may not assign or transfer these Terms of Use or any rights or obligations hereunder without the prior written consent of FloorFlex. Any attempted assignment or transfer in violation of this provision shall be null and void. FloorFlex may assign or transfer these Terms of Use or any rights or obligations hereunder without restriction. Notices All notices required or permitted under these Terms of Use shall be in writing and shall be deemed to have been duly given when delivered in person, sent by registered or certified mail, or sent by email to the parties at the addresses specified in these Terms of Use or at such other addresses as the parties may designate by written notice to the other. Intellectual Property Infringement FloorFlex respects the intellectual property rights of others and expects its users to do the same. If you believe that any content on the FloorFlex website infringes upon your intellectual property rights, please provide our designated copyright agent with the following information: A physical or electronic signature of a person authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the copyright or other intellectual property right that has been allegedly infringed; Identification of the copyrighted work or other intellectual property that has been allegedly infringed; Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing and information reasonably sufficient to permit FloorFlex to locate the material; Your contact information, including your name, address, telephone number, and email address; A statement that you have a good faith belief that the use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright or intellectual property owner, its agent, or the law; and A statement that the information in the notification is accurate and, under penalty of perjury, that you are authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the copyright or other intellectual property right that has been allegedly infringed. Contact Information If you have any questions or concerns regarding these Terms of Use, please contact us at floorflex@gmail.com. pages.disclaimer: FloorFlex Disclaimer - Important Information floorflex@gmail.com Hours: Mon-Fri: 8am – 7pm FloorFlex Home Why are we Services Space Advantages Start work +91-758-3022397 Disclaimer At FloorFlex, we strive to ensure that all the information presented on our website is accurate and up-to-date. However, we cannot guarantee the absolute accuracy of all information at all times. Product specifications, prices, and availability are subject to change without prior notice. We encourage our customers to confirm product details, including dimensions, colors, and finishes, before making a purchase. Our laminate flooring products are designed to mimic the appearance of natural materials such as wood and stone. However, it is essential to understand that there may be variations in color, texture, and grain between the product images on our website and the actual product. These variations are inherent to the manufacturing process and do not constitute a product defect. While we make every effort to display the colors of our products accurately on our website, the actual colors you see will depend on your monitor and may not be 100% accurate. We recommend ordering samples before making a final decision to ensure you are satisfied with the color and texture. FloorFlex is not responsible for any damage or injury resulting from improper installation, use, or maintenance of our laminate flooring products. We strongly recommend hiring a professional installer to ensure the best results. If you choose to install the flooring yourself, please follow the instructions provided with the product carefully. Our products come with a manufacturer's warranty that covers defects in materials and workmanship under normal use and service conditions. The warranty does not cover damage caused by improper installation, misuse, abuse, accidents, or natural disasters. Please refer to the warranty document included with your product for full details. FloorFlex is not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with the use or inability to use our products. Our liability is limited to the purchase price of the product. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. Any personal information collected on this website is used solely for the purpose of processing your order and improving our services. We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to others. At FloorFlex, we take great pride in our commitment to sustainability. Our laminate flooring products are manufactured using environmentally friendly materials and processes. We strive to minimize waste and reduce our carbon footprint throughout our operations. However, it is important to note that while we make every effort to ensure our products are eco-friendly, we cannot guarantee that they are 100% free of harmful substances. Our products comply with all relevant environmental regulations and standards, but we cannot be held responsible for any adverse health effects resulting from their use. We also take intellectual property rights very seriously. All content on this website, including text, images, and graphics, is the property of FloorFlex and is protected by copyright law. Any unauthorized use, reproduction, or distribution of our content is strictly prohibited. While we strive to provide our customers with the best possible service, we cannot guarantee that our website will be available at all times. We may experience technical difficulties or perform maintenance that may result in temporary interruptions in service. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. It is important to note that our products are not suitable for all applications. Our laminate flooring is designed for indoor use only and should not be installed in areas that are subject to excessive moisture or standing water. We cannot be held responsible for any damage or injury resulting from the use of our products in unsuitable applications. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue any product or service offered on this website at any time without prior notice. We also reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason. We also want to emphasize that our products require proper care and maintenance to ensure their longevity and appearance. While our laminate flooring is designed to be durable and easy to maintain, it is not indestructible. Scratches, dents, and other damage may occur if the flooring is not properly cared for. To clean our laminate flooring, we recommend using a damp mop or cloth with a mild detergent. Avoid using abrasive cleaners or scrubbers, as these can damage the surface of the flooring. We also recommend using felt pads on the bottom of furniture legs to prevent scratching. By using this website, you agree to the terms and conditions outlined in this disclaimer. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us at floorflex@gmail.com. Thank you for choosing FloorFlex for your laminate flooring needs. We look forward to serving you. FloorFlex © 2024 FloorFlex. Get Started with FloorFlex Today Ready to transform your space with FloorFlex laminate flooring? Begin your journey towards a more beautiful and functional environment by exploring our extensive collection. Whether you're renovating a single room or redesigning an entire property, FloorFlex offers the perfect flooring solutions to meet your needs. Browse our website now to find inspiration, expert advice, and everything you need to make your flooring project a success. Let FloorFlex be your partner in creating spaces that reflect your style and enhance your lifestyle. Care and Maintenance Tips Proper care and maintenance are essential to preserving the beauty and longevity of your FloorFlex laminate flooring. Follow these tips to keep your floors looking pristine: Regular Cleaning Sweep or vacuum your floors regularly to remove dirt and debris. Use a damp mop with a mild cleaner suitable for laminate floors for occasional deeper cleaning. Avoid Excess Water Laminate flooring is sensitive to moisture. Wipe up spills promptly and avoid using excessive water when cleaning to prevent damage to the floorboards. Use Protective Pads Place felt pads under furniture legs and use rugs or mats in high-traffic areas to protect your laminate flooring from scratches and wear. Trim Pet's Nails Keep your pets' nails trimmed to prevent them from scratching the laminate surface, preserving its appearance over time. Avoid Harsh Chemicals Avoid using harsh chemicals, abrasive cleaners, or wax-based products on your laminate flooring, as these can damage the surface. Protect from Sunlight Protect your floors from direct sunlight by using curtains or blinds, as prolonged exposure can cause fading and discoloration. pages.privacy-policy: FloorFlex Privacy Policy - Your Data Protection floorflex@gmail.com Hours: Mon-Fri: 8am – 7pm FloorFlex Home Why are we Services Space Advantages Start work +91-758-3022397 Privacy Policy At FloorFlex, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled in a safe and responsible manner. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of information we collect from you when you use our website, how we use that information, and the steps we take to protect it. Information We Collect We collect information from you when you visit our website, place an order, or subscribe to our newsletter. The information we collect may include: Your name, address, email address, and phone number Payment information, such as credit card details Details of your orders and purchases Information about your device, such as your IP address and browser type Information about your use of our website, including the pages you visit and the links you click How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect from you for the following purposes: To process and fulfill your orders To communicate with you about your orders and account To respond to your inquiries and provide customer support To improve our website and your shopping experience To personalize your experience on our website To send you marketing communications, such as newsletters and promotional offers To administer contests, promotions, and surveys To prevent fraud and unauthorized transactions To comply with legal obligations and enforce our policies How We Share Your Information We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or providing services to you. These service providers include payment processors, shipping companies, and marketing agencies. We require these service providers to keep your information confidential and use it only for the purposes for which it was disclosed. We may also release your information when we believe it is necessary to comply with the law, enforce our policies, or protect our or others' rights, property, or safety. How We Protect Your Information We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. We use industry-standard encryption technology to protect sensitive information, such as payment information, during transmission. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. Cookies and Similar Technologies We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience on our website and to personalize your experience. Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow us to recognize you and remember your preferences when you return to our website. We use the following types of cookies: Essential cookies: These are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be switched off. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you, such as setting your privacy preferences or filling in forms. Performance cookies: These collect information about how you use our website, such as which pages you visit and if you encounter any errors. They help us improve the performance and functionality of our website. Functionality cookies: These allow us to remember your preferences and personalize your experience on our website. Targeting cookies: These are used to deliver targeted advertising to you based on your interests and browsing history. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings. However, please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our website. Data Retention We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. We will also retain and use your information as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. International Transfers We may transfer your personal information to countries outside of your country of residence, including the India, for the purposes described in this Privacy Policy. We will take appropriate steps to ensure that your information is protected in accordance with this Privacy Policy and applicable laws. Security We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our practices, please contact us at floorflex@gmail.com. We will do our best to address your concerns and resolve any issues. FloorFlex © 2024 FloorFlex.
